ConsentId.title: International Scheduled Payment Intent Id
ConsentId.description: OB: Unique identification as assigned by the ASPSP to uniquely identify the consent resource.

CreationDateTime.title: Creation Date Time
CreationDateTime.description: Date and time at which the resource was created.

Permission.title: Permission
Permission.description: Specifies the Open Banking service request types.

StatusUpdateDateTime.title: Status Update Date Time
StatusUpdateDateTime.description: Date and time at which the consent resource status was updated.

ExpectedExecutionDateTime.title: Expected Execution Date Time
ExpectedExecutionDateTime.description: Expected execution date and time for the payment resource.

ExpectedSettlementDateTime.title: Expected Settlement Date Time
ExpectedSettlementDateTime.description: Expected settlement date and time for the payment resource.

CutOffDateTime.title: Cut Off Date Time
CutOffDateTime.description: Specified cut-off date and time for the payment consent.

ReadRefundAccount.title: Read Refund Account
ReadRefundAccount.description: Specifies to share the refund account details with PISP

ChargeBearer.title: Charge Bearer
ChargeBearer.description:
Specifies which party/parties will bear the charges associated with the processing of the payment transaction.
Values:
 - BorneByCreditor
 - BorneByDebtor
 - FollowingServiceLevel
 - Shared

Amount.title: Amount
Amount
Amount.description: A number of monetary units specified in an active currency where the unit of currency is explicit and compliant with ISO 4217.

Currency.title: Currency
Currency.description: A code allocated to a currency by a Maintenance Agency under an international identification scheme, as described in the latest edition of the international standard ISO 4217 "Codes for the representation of currencies and funds".

Amount.description: Amount of money associated with the charge type.

Type.title: Type
Type.description:
Charge type, in a coded form.
Values:
 - UK.OBIE.CHAPSOut

Initiation.title: Initiation

InstructionIdentification.title: Instruction Identification
InstructionIdentification.description: Unique identification as assigned by an instructing party for an instructed party to unambiguously identify the instruction.

EndToEndIdentification.title: End To End Identification
EndToEndIdentification.description: Unique identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the transaction. This identification is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain.

LocalInstrument.title: Local Instrument
LocalInstrument.description:
User community specific instrument.
Usage: This element is used to specify a local instrument, local clearing option and/or further qualify the service or service level.
Values:
 - UK.OBIE.BACS
 - UK.OBIE.BalanceTransfer
 - UK.OBIE.CHAPS
 - UK.OBIE.Euro1
 - UK.OBIE.FPS
 - UK.OBIE.Link
 - UK.OBIE.MoneyTransfer
 - UK.OBIE.Paym
 - UK.OBIE.SEPACreditTransfer
 - UK.OBIE.SEPAInstantCreditTransfer
 - UK.OBIE.SWIFT
 - UK.OBIE.Target2

ChargeBearer.title: Charge Bearer
ChargeBearer.description:
Specifies which party/parties will bear the charges associated with the processing of the payment transaction.
Values:
 - BorneByCreditor
 - BorneByDebtor
 - FollowingServiceLevel
 - Shared

CurrencyOfTransfer.title: Currency Of Transfer
CurrencyOfTransfer.description:
Specifies the currency of the to be transferred amount, which is different from the currency of the debtor's account.
Pattern: ^[A-Z]{3,3}$

DestinationCountryCode.title: Destination Country Code
DestinationCountryCode.description:
Country in which Credit Account is domiciled. Code to identify a country, a dependency, or another area of particular geopolitical interest, on the basis of country names obtained from the United Nations (ISO 3166, Alpha-2 code).
Pattern: [A-Z]{2,2}

ExtendedPurpose.title: Extended Purpose
ExtendedPurpose.description: Specifies the purpose of an international scheduled payment, when there is no corresponding 4 character code available in the ISO20022 list of Purpose Codes.

InstructionPriority.title: Instruction Priority
InstructionPriority.description:
Indicator of the urgency or order of importance that the instructing party would like the instructed party to apply to the processing of the instruction.
Values:
 - Normal
 - Urgent

Purpose.title: Purpose
Purpose.description:
Specifies the external purpose code in the format of character string with a maximum length of 4 characters.
The list of valid codes is an external code list published separately.
External code sets can be downloaded from www.iso20022.org.

RequestedExecutionDateTime.title: Requested Execution Date Time
RequestedExecutionDateTime.description: Date at which the initiating party requests the clearing agent to process the payment.

InstructedAmount.title: Instructed Amount

Amount.title: Amount
Amount.description: A number of monetary units specified in an active currency where the unit of currency is explicit and compliant with ISO 4217.

Currency.title: Currency
Currency.description: A code allocated to a currency by a Maintenance Agency under an international identification scheme, as described in the latest edition of the international standard ISO 4217 "Codes for the representation of currencies and funds".

InstructedAmount.description: Amount of money to be moved between the debtor and creditor, before deduction of charges, expressed in the currency as ordered by the initiating party.

DebtorAccount.title: Debtor Account

Identification.title: Identification
Identification.description: Identification assigned by an institution to identify an account. This identification is known by the account owner.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name of the account, as assigned by the account servicing institution.  Usage The account name is the name or names of the account owner(s) represented at an account level. The account name is not the product name or the nickname of the account.

SchemeName.title: Scheme Name
SchemeName.description: Name of the identification scheme, in a coded form as published in an external list.

SecondaryIdentification.title: Secondary Identification
SecondaryIdentification.description: This is secondary identification of the account, as assigned by the account servicing institution.  This can be used by building societies to additionally identify accounts with a roll number (in addition to a sort code and account number combination)

DebtorAccount.description: Unambiguous identification of the account of the debtor to which a debit entry will be made as a result of the transaction.

CreditorAccount.title: Creditor Account

Identification.title: Identification
Identification.description: Identification assigned by an institution to identify an account. This identification is known by the account owner.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name of the account, as assigned by the account servicing institution.  Usage The account name is the name or names of the account owner(s) represented at an account level. The account name is not the product name or the nickname of the account.

SchemeName.title: Scheme Name
SchemeName.description: Name of the identification scheme, in a coded form as published in an external list.

SecondaryIdentification.title: Secondary Identification
SecondaryIdentification.description: This is secondary identification of the account, as assigned by the account servicing institution.  This can be used by building societies to additionally identify accounts with a roll number (in addition to a sort code and account number combination)

CreditorAccount.description: Unambiguous identification of the account of the creditor to which a credit entry will be posted as a result of the payment transaction.

Creditor.title: Creditor

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party.

PostalAddress.title: Postal Address

AddressType.title: Address Type
AddressType.description: Identifies the nature of the postal address.

Department.title: Department
Department.description: Identification of a division of a large organisation or building.

SubDepartment.title: SubDepartment
SubDepartment.description: Identification of a sub-division of a large organisation or building.

StreetName.title: Street Name
StreetName.description: Name of a street or thoroughfare.

BuildingNumber.title: Building Number
BuildingNumber.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street.

PostCode.title: Post Code
PostCode.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail.

TownName.title: Town Name
TownName.description: Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government.

CountrySubDivision.title: Country Sub Division
CountrySubDivision.description: Identifies a subdivision of a country such as state, region, county.

AddressLine.title: Address Line
AddressLine.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, presented in free format text.

PostalAddress.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services.

Creditor.description: Party to which an amount of money is due.

CreditorAgent.title: Creditor Agent

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name by which a party is known and which is usually used to identify that party.

Identification.title: Identification
Identification.description: Unique and unambiguous identification of a financial institution or a branch of a financial institution.

SchemeName.title: Scheme Name
SchemeName.description:
Name of the identification scheme, in a coded form as published in an external list.
Values:
 - UK.OBIE.BICFI

PostalAddress.title: Postal Address

AddressType.title: Address Type
AddressType.description: Identifies the nature of the postal address.

Department.title: Department
Department.description: Identification of a division of a large organisation or building.

SubDepartment.title: SubDepartment
SubDepartment.description: Identification of a sub-division of a large organisation or building.

StreetName.title: Street Name
StreetName.description: Name of a street or thoroughfare.

BuildingNumber.title: Building Number
BuildingNumber.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street.

PostCode.title: Post Code
PostCode.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail.

TownName.title: Town Name
TownName.description: Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government.

CountrySubDivision.title: Country Sub Division
CountrySubDivision.description: Identifies a subdivision of a country such as state, region, county.

AddressLine.title: Address Line
AddressLine.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, presented in free format text.

PostalAddress.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services.

CreditorAgent.description: Financial institution servicing an account for the creditor.

RemittanceInformation.title: Remittance Information

Unstructured.title: Unstructured
Unstructured.description: Information supplied to enable the matching/reconciliation of an entry with the items that the payment is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system, in an unstructured form.

Reference.title: Reference
Reference.description: Unique reference, as assigned by the creditor, to unambiguously refer to the payment transaction.

RemittanceInformation.description: Information supplied to enable the matching of an entry with the items that the transfer is intended to settle, such as commercial invoices in an accounts' receivable system.

ExchangeRateInformation.title: Exchange Rate Information

ContractIdentification.title: Contract Identification
ContractIdentification.description: A number of monetary units specified in an active currency where the unit of currency is explicit and compliant with ISO 4217.

ExchangeRate.title: Exchange Rate
ExchangeRate.description: The factor used for conversion of an amount from one currency to another. This reflects the price at which one currency was bought with another currency.

RateType.title: Rate Type
RateType.description:
Specifies the type used to complete the currency exchange.
Values:
 - Actual
 - Agreed
 - Indicative

UnitCurrency.title: Unit Currency
UnitCurrency.description:
Currency in which the rate of exchange is expressed in a currency exchange. In the example 1GBP = xxxCUR, the unit currency is GBP.
Pattern: ^[A-Z]{3,3}$

ExchangeRateInformation.description: Provides details on the currency exchange rate and contract.

Initiation.description: The Initiation payload is sent by the initiating party to the ASPSP. It is used to request movement of funds from the debtor account to a creditor for a single international scheduled payment.

CompletionDateTime.title: Completion Date Time
CompletionDateTime.description: Date and time at which the requested authorisation flow must be completed.All dates in the JSON payloads are represented in ISO 8601 date-time format.

SCASupportData.title: SCA Support Data

AppliedAuthenticationApproach.title: Applied Authentication Approach
AppliedAuthenticationApproach.description: This field indicates whether the PSU was subject to SCA performed by the TPP

ReferencePaymentOrderId.title: Reference Payment Order Id
ReferencePaymentOrderId.description: If the payment is recurring, then this field is populated with the transaction identifier of the previous payment occurrence so that the ASPSP can verify that the PISP, amount and the payee are the same as the previous occurrence.

RequestedSCAExemptionType.title: Requested SCA Exemption Type
RequestedSCAExemptionType.description: This field allows a PISP to request specific SCA Exemption for a Payment Initiation

SCASupportData.description: Supporting Data provided by TPP, when requesting SCA Exemption.

Debtor.title: Debtor

Identification.title: Identification
Identification.description: Identification assigned by an institution to identify an account. This identification is known by the account owner.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name of the account, as assigned by the account servicing institution.  Usage The account name is the name or names of the account owner(s) represented at an account level. The account name is not the product name or the nickname of the account.

SchemeName.title: Scheme Name
SchemeName.description: Name of the identification scheme, in a coded form as published in an external list.

SecondaryIdentification.title: Secondary Identification
SecondaryIdentification.description: This is secondary identification of the account, as assigned by the account servicing institution.  This can be used by building societies to additionally identify accounts with a roll number (in addition to a sort code and account number combination)

Debtor.description: Only incuded in the response if `Data. ReadRefundAccount` is set to `Yes` in the consent.

Risk.title: Risk

MerchantCategoryCode.title: Merchant Category Code
MerchantCategoryCode.description: Category code conform to ISO 18245, related to the type of services or goods the merchant provides for the transaction.

MerchantCustomerIdentification.title: Merchant Customer Identification
MerchantCustomerIdentification.description: The unique customer identifier of the PSU with the merchant.

DeliveryAddress.title: Delivery Address

AddressLine.title: Address Line
AddressLine.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services, that is presented in free format text.

StreetName.title: Street Name
StreetName.description: Name of a street or thoroughfare.

BuildingNumber.title: Building Number
BuildingNumber.description: Number that identifies the position of a building on a street.

PostCode.title: Post Code
PostCode.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail.

TownName.title: Town Name
TownName.description: Name of a built-up area, with defined boundaries, and a local government.

CountrySubDivision.title: Country Sub Division
CountrySubDivision.description: Identifies a subdivision of a country such as state, region, county.

Country.title: Country
Country.description: Nation with its own government, occupying a particular territory.

DeliveryAddress.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services or in free format text.

Risk.description: The Risk section is sent by the initiating party to the ASPSP. It is used to specify additional details for risk scoring for Payments.

Meta.title: Meta

FirstAvailableDateTime.title: First Available Date Time
FirstAvailableDateTime.description: All dates in the JSON payloads are represented in ISO 8601 date-time format.

LastAvailableDateTime.title: Last Available Date Time
LastAvailableDateTime.description: All dates in the JSON payloads are represented in ISO 8601 date-time format.

Meta.description: Meta Data relevant to the payload
